languages.text: Монолит душ, очищенный труппой арлекинов на Первом Мире, был сокрыт от алчных взглядов мон-кай бушующими варп-штормами. В системах, соседствующих с этой планетой, участились исчезновения кораблей, и сектор, прозванный Проклятыми Рифами, стали избегать даже отважные капитаны.

The Spirit Monolith, purified by the Harlequin Troupe on the Crone World, was hidden from the insatiable eyes of mon-keigh by raging warp storms. Ships started going missing more frequently in the systems close to the planet. Even the most courageous captains gave the region a wide berth, and it was named the Damned Reefs.
languages.original_text: Монолит душ, очищенный труппой арлекинов на Первом Мире, был сокрыт от алчных взглядов мон-кай бушующими варп-штормами. В системах, соседствующих с этой планетой, участились исчезновения кораблей, и сектор, прозванный Проклятыми Рифами, стали избегать даже отважные капитаны.

traits.locale_text: The Spirit Monolith, purified by the Harlequin Troupe on a Maiden World, was hidden from the insatiable eyes of mon-keigh with raging Warp Storms. Ships started missing more frequently in the systems close to that planet. Even the most courageous captains gave this sector a wide berth, and it was named the Damned Reefs.

The Spirit Monolith, purified by the Harlequin Troupe on a Maiden World, was hidden from the insatiable eyes of mon-keigh with raging Warp Storms. Ships started missing more frequently in the systems close to that planet. Even the most courageous captains gave this sector a wide berth, and it was named the Damned Reefs.

The Spirit Monolith, purified by the Harlequin Troupe on the Crone World, was hidden from the insatiable eyes of mon-keigh by raging warp storms. Ships started going missing more frequently in the systems close to the planet. Even the most courageous captains gave the region a wide berth, and it was named the Damned Reefs.

The Spirit Monolith, purified by the Harlequin Troupe on the Crone World, was hidden from the insatiable eyes of mon-keigh by raging warp storms. Ships started going missing more frequently in the systems close to the planet. Even the most courageous captains gave the region a wide berth, and it was named the Damned Reefs.

The Spirit Monolith, purified by the Harlequin Troupe on the Crone World, was hidden from the insatiable eyes of mon-keigh by raging warp storms. Ships started going missing more frequently in the systems close to the planet. Even the most courageous captains gave the region a wide berth, and it was named the Damned Reefs.

The Spirit Monolith, purified by the Harlequin Troupe on the Crone World, was hidden from the insatiable eyes of mon-keigh by raging warp storms. Ships started going missing more frequently in the systems close to the planet. Even the most courageous captains gave the region a wide berth, and it was named the Damned Reefs.

languages.text: 位于老妪世界的巨型灵魂石被丑角剧团净化之后，隐藏在了肆虐的亚空间风暴之中，远离猴子的贪婪视线。而这颗行星的临近星系中，舰船失踪的频率越来越高。即便是最勇敢的舰长，也对这片区域敬而远之，将其命名为“诅咒暗礁”。
languages.original_text: The Spirit Monolith, purified by the Harlequin Troupe on the Crone World, was hidden from the insatiable eyes of mon-keigh by raging warp storms. Ships started going missing more frequently in the systems close to the planet. Even the most courageous captains gave the region a wide berth, and it was named the Damned Reefs.

traits.locale_text: 位于老妪世界的巨型灵魂石被丑角剧团净化之后，隐藏在了肆虐的亚空间风暴之中，远离猴子的贪婪视线。而这颗行星的临近星系中，舰船失踪的频率越来越高。即便是最勇敢的舰长，也对这片区域敬而远之，将其命名为“诅咒暗礁”。

languages.text: Der Geistesmonolith, von dem Harlekin-Ensemble auf der Hexenwelt geläutert, wurde durch tosende Warpstürme vor den unersättlichen Augen von Chem-Pan-Sey verborgen. In den Systemen in der Nähe des Planeten begannen immer häufiger Schiffe zu verschwinden. Selbst die mutigsten Captains flogen einen großen Bogen um die Region, die bald nur noch Verfluchtes Riff genannt wurde.
languages.original_text: The Spirit Monolith, purified by the Harlequin Troupe on the Crone World, was hidden from the insatiable eyes of mon-keigh by raging warp storms. Ships started going missing more frequently in the systems close to the planet. Even the most courageous captains gave the region a wide berth, and it was named the Damned Reefs.

traits.locale_text: Der Geistesmonolith, von dem Harlekin-Ensemble auf der Hexenwelt geläutert, wurde durch tosende Warpstürme vor den unersättlichen Augen von Chem-Pan-Sey verborgen. In den Systemen in der Nähe des Planeten begannen immer häufiger Schiffe zu verschwinden. Selbst die mutigsten Captains flogen einen großen Bogen um die Region, die bald nur noch Verfluchtes Riff genannt wurde.

languages.text: Le Monolithe aux esprits, purifié par les Arlequins du monde déchu, fut caché à l'insatiable regard des mon-keigh par de terribles tempêtes Warp. De plus en plus de vaisseaux vinrent à disparaître dans les systèmes les plus proches de la planète. Même les capitaines les plus courageux refusaient de s'en approcher, ce qui valut à la région le surnom de Récif Damné.
languages.original_text: The Spirit Monolith, purified by the Harlequin Troupe on the Crone World, was hidden from the insatiable eyes of mon-keigh by raging warp storms. Ships started going missing more frequently in the systems close to the planet. Even the most courageous captains gave the region a wide berth, and it was named the Damned Reefs.

traits.locale_text: Le Monolithe aux esprits, purifié par les arlequins du monde déchu, fut caché à l'insatiable regard des mon-keigh par de terribles tempêtes Warp. De plus en plus de vaisseaux vinrent à disparaître dans les systèmes les plus proches de la planète. Même les capitaines les plus courageux refusaient de s'en approcher, ce qui valut à la région le surnom de Récif Damné.

languages.text: El Monolito Espiritual, purificado en el mundo ancestral gracias a la compañía de Arlequines, quedó oculto a los ojos insaciables de los mon-keigh por medio de salvajes tormentas de disformidad. Las naves empezaron a desaparecer con más frecuencia en los sistemas cercanos al planeta. Incluso los capitanes más valientes evitaban la región, por lo que acabó tomando el nombre de Arrecifes de la Perdición.
languages.original_text: The Spirit Monolith, purified by the Harlequin Troupe on the Crone World, was hidden from the insatiable eyes of mon-keigh by raging warp storms. Ships started going missing more frequently in the systems close to the planet. Even the most courageous captains gave the region a wide berth, and it was named the Damned Reefs.

traits.locale_text: El Monolito Espiritual, purificado en el mundo ancestral gracias a la compañía de Arlequines, quedó oculto a los ojos insaciables de los mon-keigh por medio de salvajes tormentas de disformidad. Las naves empezaron a desaparecer con más frecuencia en los sistemas cercanos al planeta. Incluso los capitanes más valientes evitaban la región, por lo que acabó tomando el nombre de Arrecifes de la Perdición.

languages.text: 老朽惑星のハーレクィン・トルゥプによって浄化されたスピリット・モノリスは、荒れ狂う歪みの嵐によってモン＝ケイの貪欲な目から隠されていた。この惑星に近い星系では、船が頻繁に行方不明になるようになった。最も勇敢な船長たちでさえこの地域から距離を置くようになり、呪われし岩礁と名付けられた。
languages.original_text: The Spirit Monolith, purified by the Harlequin Troupe on the Crone World, was hidden from the insatiable eyes of mon-keigh by raging warp storms. Ships started going missing more frequently in the systems close to the planet. Even the most courageous captains gave the region a wide berth, and it was named the Damned Reefs.

traits.locale_text: 老朽惑星のハーレクィン・トルゥプによって浄化されたスピリット・モノリスは、荒れ狂う歪みの嵐によってモン＝ケイの貪欲な目から隠されていた。この惑星に近い星系では、船が頻繁に行方不明になるようになった。最も勇敢な船長たちでさえこの地域から距離を置くようになり、呪われし岩礁と名付けられた。

languages.text: Acuze Dünya'da Arleken Kumpanyası tarafından arındırılan Ruh Monoliti, hiddetli öteboyut fırtınaları vasıtasıyla doymak bilmez mon-keigh bakışlarından gizlendi. Gemiler, gezegene yakın sistemlerde daha sık kaybolmaya başladı. En cesur kaptanlar bile Lanetli Resifler adı verilen bölgeyle yaklaşmaktan kaçınır oldu.
languages.original_text: The Spirit Monolith, purified by the Harlequin Troupe on the Crone World, was hidden from the insatiable eyes of mon-keigh by raging warp storms. Ships started going missing more frequently in the systems close to the planet. Even the most courageous captains gave the region a wide berth, and it was named the Damned Reefs.

traits.locale_text: Acuze Dünya'da Arleken Kumpanyası tarafından arındırılan Ruh Monoliti, hiddetli öteboyut fırtınaları vasıtasıyla doymak bilmez mon-keigh bakışlarından gizlendi. Gemiler, gezegene yakın sistemlerde daha sık kaybolmaya başladı. En cesur kaptanlar bile Lanetli Resifler ismini alan bölgeyle aralarına güvenli bir mesafede koydu.
